summary: This module implements an IRC‑based communication layer for the daemon. It defines a message channel that connects to an IRC server, manages nicknames, joins channels, sends public and private messages, and announces trading orders. A Twisted client factory and protocol class handle connection setup, reconnection, disconnection, and enforce message‑rate limits.
business_intent: Allow the daemon to broadcast trading information and receive commands via IRC, providing real‑time market updates and remote control through a familiar chat platform.
